column2: When I was a kid a million years ago, during the 1980s, our president was a doddering simpleton who really, really hated communists. The Gipper once made a “joke” that the United States was going to nuke the Soviet Union. He didn’t know the mic was on, and the chiste didn’t go over so well. In fact, the comment was “taken seriously by the Soviets, who stood on alert for 30 minutes.” As horrific as this gaffe was, at least Reagan wasn’t serious. The same cannot be said for the current GOP inhabitant of the

Air pollution may be a global problem, but it’s one where local action makes a big difference. Across the nation, cities like Houston are stepping up to address air pollution and air quality, often in the face of inaction by state and federal governments. City Hall is the first call most residents make when they face a problem, and for good reason. City government is closest to the people, and it is, by nature, the most responsive. Cities have the responsibility to do everything in their power to protect

Accident vasculaire cérébral : l ignorance peut être fatale Un traitement en urgence réduit le risque de handicap en cas d accident vasculaire cérébral. Une enquête montre que l ignorance des symptômes retarde la prise en charge. L accident vasculaire cérébral (AVC) frappe chaque année 150 000 personnes dans notre pays. C est la principale cause de handicap chez l adulte. Un médicament injecté dans les trois heures suivant les premiers symptômes réduit le risque de séquelles de 40 % après un AVC. Or, une

Guinée: décès du président Lansana Conté après 24 ans de règne contesté Le président de Guinée, le général Lansana Conté, est mort lundi soir à l âge de 74 ans, après un long règne de 24 ans marqué par de sanglantes répressions et une gestion calamiteuse d un pays classé parmi les plus pauvres du monde malgré un sous-sol très riche. Il répond aux questions du journal Le Potentiel. Le Potentiel : Colonel, depuis combien de temps êtes-vous au Congo ? Colonel Verbroeck : Je suis arrivé au début de lannée 2003. Jentame bientôt ma 6ème année

Around the world there is strife and violence. In all those global hotspots -- from Syria to Iraq, from Afghanistan to Darfur -- innocent children are among those suffering the most, yet there is often too little attention paid to the physical and emotional trauma they endure. Syria -- where, prior to 2010 almost all children were enrolled in school and literacy rates exceeded 90 percent -- today has the second-lowest enrollment rate in the world, with almost three million children no longer in class. USA: Une femme reçoit la première greffe quasi-totale d un visage Washington Une équipe de huit chirurgiens de l Ohio (nord des Etats-Unis) a greffé le visage d une femme à 80%. Cette greffe faciale presque totale est présentée comme une première mondiale par la clinique, qui n a pas révélé l identité de la patiente. ats | 17.12.2008 | 12:46 Il s agit de la quatrième greffe du visage menée avec succès dans le monde. Accidents involving pedestrians wearing headphones has increased: study The number of pedestrians wearing headphones who are seriously injured or killed near roadways and railways has tripled in six years, a new US study shows. According to Bloomberg Businessweek, between 2004 to 2005, the number of headphone-wearing pedestrians who were seriously injured was 16. By 2011, the number had increased to 47. According to the study, published in the journal Injury Prevention, in 34 of the 116 cases mentioned,

I have a confession to make. I am a prolific Facebook poster. Social media has been a means of connecting with kindred spirits worldwide. I am indeed a people person and do have many face-to-face friends as well, not just those I encounter in cyberspace. It has also been a way of spreading the word about the work I do and to share the articles I write for various venues. It has become a platform for expression, much like a blank painting canvas. Why We Still Have Body Hair Published December 15, 2011 Human body hair might seem to be useless on today s modern man, but it could help us detect parasites, researchers suggest, adding there s a chance our female ancestors preferred a bug-free mate, and so opted for hairier guys. Humans appear relatively hairless compared with our ape relatives, but the density of hair follicles on our skin is actually the same as would be expected of an ape our size. The fine hairs that cover our bodies, which have re

Le Zimbabwe en train de devenir un "Etat défaillant" Le Zimbabwe est en train de tomber rapidement au rang d Etat "défaillant", alors que le président Robert Mugabe tient le pays en otage, a dénoncé jeudi l ambassadeur des Etats-Unis à Harare, James McGee. Pour faire face à l épidémie de choléra qui frappe le pays, Washington a débloqué une aide supplémentaire de 6,2 millions de dollars pour distribuer des produits sanitaires, des pastilles de purification de l eau et des médicaments, a annoncé pour sa pa

Reuters Thursday 08 May 2014 Saudi Arabia replaced the head of Jeddah’s King Fahd Hospital on Tuesday as it struggled with mounting deaths from the SARS-like Middle East Respiratory Syndrome ahead of an influx of Muslim pilgrims in July. The Health Ministry said on its website the move aimed to fight the spread of the virus and would “guarantee the immediate improvement of the medical care service” in the hospital, where a number of MERS patients are being treated. Число пожаров произошедших в столице в новогоднюю ночь и первые дни нового года снизилось по сравнению с прошлым годом в два раза сообщил журналистам в среду начальник управления надзорной деятельности ГУМЧС РФ по Москве Олег Найденков.      «С 31 декабря 2011 года по 3 января 2012 года произошло 54 пожара. По сравнению с предыдущим годом — снижение на 50%» — сказал Найденков.      Он добавил что

年節食品抽驗 漂白劑超標6倍   2012.01.17 03:45 am   北市抽驗 部分蠶豆 豆干不合格 / 張益華 陳欣怡    衛生局昨天公布2012年第3波年節產品品質檢驗不符規定名單，共有藍太太販售的蠶豆（中）等11項商品不合規定。   記者陳立凱／攝影下周日就是除夕，台北市衛生局昨天公布最後一波年節食品抽查結果，其中一件蠶豆漂白劑殘留量高達6倍，還有4件五香豆乾防腐劑超標。    衛生局食藥處處長陳立奇表示，這次檢驗針對即食豆製品、米濕製品、肉加工品、素食食品、水產加工品、堅果加工品等，一共抽驗了167件產品，共有11件不合格。    不合格產品中，有兩件蠶豆二氧化硫殘留量超標，其中一件甚至高達6倍，產品皆來自新北市板橋區的東興田豆食品有限公司。另外有4件五香豆乾防腐劑己二烯酸超標，產品皆來自台中市的晟祐食品有限公司。    東興田豆周姓業者回應，原本在蠶豆內加入二氧化硫，是想讓顏色漂亮一點，接獲衛生局通知後就已將產品下架，將檢討超標原因；而且在新的一批產品中也已不敢使用二氧化硫。台中市的晟祐食品林姓業者回應，可能是滷的時候，己二烯酸攪拌不均，才造成這批產品檢驗超標，已將產品下架。

惠誉：希腊终将违约 但或会有序进行2012-01-17 20:36:43\u3000来源: 财华社(深圳)\u3000有0人参与手机看新闻   惠誉评级周二表示，希腊债务将违约，尽管此次违约可能是有序的。   惠誉负责欧洲、中东和非洲主权和超国家组织的主管 Edward Parker表示，希腊债务违约即将发生，希腊已无偿债能力，因此将会违约。   Parker称，惠誉相信即使该国私营部门同意自愿减记希腊债务，希腊债务也将构成违约。并认为最糟糕的结果是无序违约的发生。   标普评级负责欧洲主权信用评级的主管Moritz Kraemer早前亦曾表示，希腊不久将发生债务违约。    ]

醫生的高工資要高在明處   鉅亨網新聞中心\u3000(來源：財匯資訊，摘自：中國經濟網)\u30002012-01-17 13:37:02\u3000   “醫務人員的工資本來就應該比別人高。醫生工資應該比市內平均工資高5～10倍，這樣醫生才能有尊嚴地活著，醫改才能成功。”在近日召開的廣東省政協分組討論會上，廣東省政協委員、省婦幼保健院副院長王頎表示。（   “醫務人員的工資本來就應該比別人高。醫生工資應該比市內平均工資高5～10倍，這樣醫生才能有尊嚴地活著，醫改才能成功。”在近日召開的廣東省政協分組討論會上，廣東省政協委員、省婦幼保健院副院長王頎表示。（見1月14日《新快報》）    應當承認，在現代社會，“醫務人員的工資本來就應該比別人高”不是一個錯誤說法，“比市內平均工資高5～10倍”也并不算特別離譜和不可理喻。美國政府此前公布的職業工資調查數據顯示，2008年美國收入最高的10個專業性職業中，9個與醫學相關。其中，收入最高的外科醫生平均年薪高達20.6萬美元，而同期全美所有行業平均年薪不過3.9萬美元。    醫務人員的工資之所以“本來就應該比別人高”，無疑具有很多基於職業特殊性的理由。

I was born in 1971; you could do the math, but I m begging you: Please don t! For as long as I can remember, there was always a nagging question in the back of my mind that I could never quite find the answer to. I found myself asking that same question over and over again: "Why am I here?" When I was younger, my mom told me the story of how I came into being. She was done having children. Dépêche : HARARE (AFP) - Zimbabwe: le gouvernement qualifie d "urgence nationale" l épidémie de choléra Le gouvernement du Zimbabwe a qualifié d "urgence nationale" l épidémie de choléra qui a déjà fait plus de 550 morts dans le pays et appelé à l aide la communauté internationale, ont souligné jeudi les médias officiels. Members of the public have been warned about the operations of rogue health officers at Nairobi City Hall who have been injecting travellers with water instead of the recommended yellow fever vaccine. In a notice, Nairobi Governor Mike Sonko sounded the alarm to city residents and Kenyans over the unscrupulous health officials. Sonko said that the officers are luring unsuspecting Kenyans with cheaper prices of Sh1,000 for the vaccine, which goes for around Sh2,500 in authorized health facilities. “Members

On our morning commute to work, a colleague and I play a game called "Train Face." The rules are simple: We board the train at the same time and the first person to see someone smiling wins. Not surprisingly, we often go miles with no smiles, the winner usually spotting a vacation smile as we near Union Square. Interestingly, what makes the game most difficult to win is not a plague of the "Monday s." It is the inability to see anybody s face properly. Most people have their chin tucked into their chest,

Reports of negligence and cover-ups on the part of a Veterans Affairs (VA) health care branch allegedly led to deaths and drew a call for investigation from Sen. John Cornyn (R-TX). According to CNN, Phoenix Veterans Affairs Health Care (PVAHCS) not only took months to process routine and emergency requests for appointments but also kept two separate lists of patients. Choléra: la frontière entre Afrique du Sud et Zimbabwe "zone de catastrophe" L Afrique du Sud a déclaré sa région nord, frontalière avec le Zimbabwe, "zone de catastrophe" en raison de la propagation de l épidémie de choléra, a indiqué jeudi un responsable du gouvernement provincial. "Le gouvernement provincial a pris la décision de déclarer zone de catastrophe toute la région de Vhembe" (nord-est), a affirmé à l AFP le porte-parole du gouvernement provincial, Mogale Nchabeleng. ERBIL/BAGHDAD Iraq, Oct 29 (Reuters) - Iraqi Kurdish leader Masoud Barzani said he would give up his position as president on Nov. 1, after an independence referendum he championed backfired and triggered a regional crisis. There was high drama at the Kurdish parliament, which was stormed by armed protesters as it met to approve the veteran leader’s resignation as Kurdish president. 京港澳高速湖南段车流量井喷 频发拥堵追尾事故    2012年01月17日 19:33\u3000来源：中国新闻网\u3000参与互动(0)   \u3000\u3000中新社长沙1月17日电 (傅煜 吕高安 江钻)一年一度的春节大迁徙正在火热上演，加之雨雪大雾天气滋扰，中国南北交通大动脉京港澳高速公路湖南段车流量“井喷”，频发拥堵追尾事故。   \u3000\u3000湖南地处中国中部地区，是贯通南北的咽喉之地，历来春运压力较大。湖南省高速公路管理局17日统计显示，今年1月以来，京港澳高速湖南段日均车流量超23万台次，其中16日达31万台次，呈“井喷”之势。   \u3000\u3000在雨雪天的阻挡下，蜂拥回乡的车流只能“慢步挪移”。1月16日下午，京港澳高速公路湖南由南往北方向发生拥堵现象，其中耒宜、潭耒、临长段较为严重。一位堵在耒宜路上的网友直发微博感叹，“堵车时，iPad下载了七部电影全部看完了。”   \u3000\u3000经高速路政、交警全力抢通后，17日凌晨5时，耒宜段(K1781-K1805段)发生一起8车追尾事故，再次造成该路段由南往北向拥堵。经紧急处置，事故路段于上午10时

Légionelle à lécole de gendarmerie Interdiction de se doucher ou dutiliser les lavabos dans trois bâtiments de lEcole des officiers de la gendarmerie nationale (EOGN) de Melun jusquà nouvel ordre. Vendredi, des tests menés par la société responsable du chauffage ont révélé la présence de légionelle dans leau. By Kat Craddock Here in the Saveur Test Kitchen, we’ve had ample opportunity to test drive a covetable selection of kitchen tools. Some of our favorites are the kitchen knives. When it comes to style, comfort, and function, many high end brands are worth every precious penny. 春節就醫何處去？ 健保局公佈特約院所   台灣醒報 (2012-01-11 16:58)    【台灣醒報記者潘姿羽台北報導】春節期間，民眾若不小心吃壞肚子，或是身體出了問題該怎麼辦？健保局提醒民眾，可以上網查詢特約醫療院所的看診情形，健保局網站也有公布各院所的看診時段，希望民眾可以開心又安心的過新年。    健保局醫務管理組組長蔡淑鈴表示，出門在外最怕的就是生病，如果真的不小心感冒或身體不舒服，可以到「健保局全球資訊網」的一般民眾／健保醫療服務／掛號費及看診時段查詢，輸入想查詢院所的縣市、鄉鎮市區、地址或院所名稱，便能就近找到特約醫療院所。    有些民眾可能不習慣把重要證件帶在身邊，蔡淑鈴對此表示，如果春節時，身體不適需要就醫，但沒未帶健保卡，可以在自費就診後7天內(不含例假日)帶健保卡到原就診院所辦理退費。    另外，如果是緊急傷病、臨時分娩，必須在非全民健保的特約醫事服務機構就醫，或出國旅遊時有緊急情況，要在當地醫療院所立刻就醫，民眾可以在就診後6個月內附上「自墊醫療費用核退申請書」、「醫療費用收據正本及費用明細」、「診斷書或證明文件」、「於國外就醫者需另備當次出入境證明文件」，就能向投

Smaller servings mean more balanced meals for kids: US study January 17, 2012 3:21pm Feeding preschoolers smaller portions of the main dish at lunchtime means they ll eat more fruit and vegetables on the side and fewer total calories, according to a new study. Researchers said the finding may give parents one extra strategy to encourage youngsters to eat more greens, as childhood obesity rates continue rising and research suggests that kids lag well behind guidelines for fruit and veggie consumption. How far would you go to avoid being alone with your thoughts? People vastly prefer passive activities like reading or listening to music over spending just a few minutes by themselves. Being alone with no distractions was so distasteful to two-thirds of men and a quarter of women that they elected to give themselves mild electric shocks rather than sit quietly in a room with nothing but the thoughts in their heads, according to a study from the University of Virginia.
